projects.title: Neetechs Full-Stack Business Platform
projects.description: A full-stack web platform built using Angular, Django, PostgreSQL, and AWS S3. Includes authentication (email/phone/OTP), SSR support, multi-language routing, and a modern UI inspired by Pico. The system integrates payment flows, chat, user dashboards, and real-time updates using Django Channels.

projects.title: Neetechs AI Autocomplete VS Code Extension
projects.description: A custom VS Code extension that provides intelligent GPT-powered code suggestions. Features lazy initialization, API key handling, lightweight UX, and language-specific triggers. Designed to improve coding speed and reduce repetitive boilerplate for developers.

projects.title: Advanced Laptop & Hardware Repair Service
projects.description: A technical repair project involving deep diagnostic work on laptops, BIOS recovery, thermal optimization, and component-level fixes. Included replacing power ICs, optimizing system performance, and ensuring stable long-term hardware reliability.

projects.title: Neetechs (SaaS Platform)
projects.description: Built with Angular + Django. Features OTP & Web3 login, SSR, Stripe integration, and real-time WebSocket chat.

projects.title: Genius Minigames (BETA)
projects.description: Multiplayer Roblox game built using Lua scripting.

projects.title: Neetechs AI Autocompletion (VS Code Extension)
projects.description: GPT-4 based autocomplete for devs. Language-aware, lazy-loaded, and responsive via VS Code status bar.

projects.title: Sayed Token (Solana Blockchain)
projects.description: Custom token deployed on Solana with 16.1B supply using Token 2022 Program. Includes authority controls and on-chain transfers.
